reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While on 3-week tour of Scotland, we wanted to stay in Lochinver. We had no reservations on this bank holiday weekend. Every place in town was booked, and the guy in the Tourist Information Center took pity on us and gave us the numbers of some properties outside of town that were not registered with the center.
reviews.title: A Real Treasure - Wanted To Move In!

likes.liked: — The comfort and service afforded by the hosts.
